title: Super Epic Host OC

params.attack: The greatest. (can't be stopped by anything)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are not actually a player role, you are controlled by the host to rig the game in favor of whoever the host wants to win. Ideally the host will try to kill the afks first but it's their call lawl.
- All players will be told of your existence day 1. You cannot do anything until Night 2.
- The host chooses your name and lore (if any).

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Super Epic Anime Save: You save someone, stopping them from dying. You might even kill their attacker if you feel like it.
- Better than u: Attack a player at night. This can't be stopped and anything will die from it.
- Rig: Select someone at night. The following day they will die if they recieve three or more votes.

desc:
Post 4824
*Oh, em, gee, check out this awesome character I made guys.*
